title: AuditEvent data model based on HL7 equivalent resource

resourceType.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/' This is a AuditEvent resource

meta.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Meta' The metadata about a resource. This is content in the resource that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/uri' String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/code' A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

text.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Narrative' A human-readable summary of the resource conveying the essential clinical and business information for the resource.

contained.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/ResourceList' These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope.

extension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Extension' Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

modifierExtension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Extension' Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be 'AuditEvent'

subtype.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Coding' A reference to a code defined by a terminology system.

action.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/code' A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_action.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

period.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Period' A time period defined by a start and end date and optionally time.

recorded.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/instant' An instant in time - known at least to the second

_recorded.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

outcome.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/code' A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_outcome.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

outcomeDesc.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/string' A sequence of Unicode characters

_outcomeDesc.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

purposeOfEvent.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

agent.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/AuditEvent_Agent' A record of an event made for purposes of maintaining a security log. Typical uses include detection of intrusion attempts and monitoring for inappropriate usage.

source.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/AuditEvent_Source' A record of an event made for purposes of maintaining a security log. Typical uses include detection of intrusion attempts and monitoring for inappropriate usage.

entity.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/AuditEvent_Entity' A record of an event made for purposes of maintaining a security log. Typical uses include detection of intrusion attempts and monitoring for inappropriate usage.
